description: This file defines the OllamaEmbedder class, which is a specialized embedder utilizing the Ollama client for generating embeddings. It includes dependency checks, version validation, and methods for obtaining embeddings from text.

classes.name: OllamaEmbedder
classes.description: A data class that extends Embedder to provide embedding functionality using the Ollama client, with configurable parameters and methods for retrieving embeddings.

methods.name: client
methods.description: Property that initializes and returns the OllamaClient instance, configuring it with host, timeout, and additional client parameters.

methods.name: _response
methods.description: Generates a response from the Ollama client for a given text, extracting and formatting the embeddings from the response.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Returns the embedding vector for the provided text, ensuring it matches the expected dimensions.

methods.name: get_embedding_and_usage
methods.description: Returns a tuple containing the embedding vector and usage information (currently None) for the provided text.
